sentences.en: As to the ideological work, we should never go about impetuously.
sentences.cn: 对于思想工作, 千万不可操切从事.

sentences.en: Children's literature is an ideological battleground.
sentences.cn: 儿童文学是各种意识形态交锋的战场。

sentences.en: He had ample opportunity to reaffirm his basic ideological commitment.
sentences.cn: 他曾多次有机会重申他的基本思想信念.

sentences.en: He helped me enormously with advice on how to do ideological work.
sentences.cn: 他告诉我怎样做思想工作,对我有很大帮助.

sentences.en: I, too, saw great opportunities, scenes of ideological victory, and personal triumph.
sentences.cn: 我也看到了大好时机, 看到了意识形态胜利的场景和个人飞黄腾达的前途.

sentences.en: In doing ideological work, one must suit one's Methods : To the situation.
sentences.cn: 做思想工作必须对症下药.

sentences.en: In rudderless despair and searching for ideological sustenance, he contemplated religion.
sentences.cn: 在失去航向的绝望中,在寻求精神食粮的过程中, 他想到了宗教.

sentences.en: Physical and ideological barriers had come down in Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 物质和意识形态上的障碍在东欧已不复存在。
切实加强思想道德建设.

sentences.en: Some have minimized the importance of ideological factors.
sentences.cn: 有些人淡化了意识形态因素的重要性。

sentences.en: The challenge before our countries was to fashion joint action despite ideological differences.
sentences.cn: 我们两国面临的挑战是如何在不顾意识形态分歧的情况下采取联合行动.

sentences.en: The ideological make-up of the unions is now radically different from what it had been.
sentences.cn: 协会的思想观念与过去截然不同。

sentences.en: The old ideological groups had started recruiting members again.
sentences.cn: 那些老的意识团体又开始吸纳新的成员.

sentences.en: The party is split by ideological differences.
sentences.cn: 意识形态上的差异造成该政党分裂。

sentences.en: The result was class warfare without ideological overtones on a grand and violent scale.
sentences.cn: 结果是酿成了不带意识形态色彩的规模巨大而激烈的阶级斗争.

sentences.en: The superimposition of ideological conflict and personal jealousies turned inherent rivalry into obsession.
sentences.cn: 意识形态的冲突和个人之间相互不服气交织在一起,使得固有的敌对发展到势不两立的地步.
